participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Caring and dedicated, Michael is passionate about his work and family.
participant_1.background: my favorite movie is friday. i'm now looking for a new job. i'm a doctor. my daughter is a child prodigy. i enjoy going to the park.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, Linda finds solace in her hobbies and cherishes community events.
participant_2.background: i'm scared of dying. i have a dogs. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.
